description: A comedic scene where Emily mistakenly tries to text on a landline, leading to a humorous exchange with Lucas.
title: Digital Dilemma
n_1: Emily stands in the office, holding a landline phone, a look of concentration on her face.
n_2: Lucas watches, bemused, as Emily attempts to text on the landline phone.
n_3: Realizing her mistake, Emily bursts into laughter, while Lucas can't help but join in.
n_4: They share a laugh over the mix-up, finding humor in the everyday.
c1_3: Oh no, how did I even...?
c1_4: Guess I'm a bit too digital!
